name: react-sandbox
description: Vanilla JS react implementation, inspired by https://pomb.us/build-your-own-react/

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp src/index.html build && npm run rollup
scripts.test: npm run nyc:prepare && node src/index.test.js src && npm run nyc:report
scripts.test:build: npm run build && rm output/*.png && node src/index.test.js build
scripts.travis: npm audit && npm run test && npm run coveralls && npm run test:build
